rooms.name: Entrance Hallway
rooms.description: Spacious foyer with natural lighting and eco-friendly materials.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Central living area designed for sustainable energy use; incorporates large windows for daylighting, with an open floor plan to enhance air circulation.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Eco-friendly dining space adjacent to the living room, emphasizing natural materials and efficient lighting.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with an adjoining balcony, oriented according to Vastu principles for positive energy flow.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Cozy guest room designed for privacy and natural lighting.

openings.description: South-facing balcony designed for optimal sunlight and ventilation.

rooms.name: Rooftop Terrace
rooms.description: Spacious terrace designed for relaxation and entertainment, with sustainable landscaping and a retractable awning.

rooms.name: Home Theater
rooms.description: Intimate home theater area on the roof featuring soundproofing and energy-efficient lighting systems.

openings.description: Steep but accessible staircase from first floor to rooftop, designed for safe evacuation and minimal environmental impact.
